title: throwback wednesday (because why not)
body:
shout out to all those people from the archive (who probably still hate each other just as much as they did then, hopefully with exceptions), good times indeed. 
anyway I just thought back on things and remembered you all and I really kinda miss most of you, some in a love/hate kind of way.

hope life's treating you all well

ps: big shoutout to the Riot team for being some really cool people

replies.body: I miss ESP Azamalaza and Veritas

> I miss ESP Azamalaza and Veritas
